text: Boghall is a Council Estate built in the early 1960s in West Lothian, Scotland just to the east of Bathgate. Boghall's two primary schools are Boghall Primary School and St. Columbus R.C. Primary School. The amenities in Boghall include a post office, church, butchers and newsagents. ==Notable residents== *Boghall and Bathgate Caledonia Pipe Band ==External links== *Canmore - Bathgate, Boghall Farmstead site record Category:Villages in West Lothian Category:Bathgate
title: Boghall
